verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is the day, the Lord has made
Let us be glad - Give Him praise
Rejoicing now that we are saved
That's why
Everybody in the church is dancing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your mercy makes us celebrate
And revel in Your lavish grace
This joy we've got to demonstrate
That's why
Everybody in the church is dancing
